english.segment1: Just when you think you've seen it all you find the answer. Looming like a shadow overhead. Reawakens your obsession. To find the truth and put your doubts to bed
english.segment2: On and on and round and round. Here among the lost and found. Listen for a certain sound. Even a whisper. Until the truth brings you around. Keeping one ear to the ground
english.segment3: And when you finally see the light in all its glory. Shining on the truth of who you are. One more searcher with a story. A wiser fool who's fallowing a star
